member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Coral.CoralDonorInfo
member.summary: Contains all donor information necessary for use by the Coral application.

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.DonorUpdate.DonorGeneticDataSaveModel
member.summary: A model with all the fields needed to update a donor's Definitive Hla record.

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.DonorUpdate.DonorGeneticDataSaveResults
member.summary: Indicates success or failure of the operation to update a Donor's definitive genetic data.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.DonorUpdate.DonorGeneticDataSaveResults.Success
member.summary: True: Updating the donor's genetic data was successful. False: Something went wrong while updating the donor's genetic data, and the database was not changed.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.DonorUpdate.DonorGeneticDataSaveResults.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If something went wrong while updating the donor's genetic data, this field will contain the error message raised by solar.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.DonorUpdate.DonorUpdate.AuditId
member.summary: The id of the audit table row that triggered this donor update

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.DonorUpdate.SearchableDonorUpdate.PublishedDateTime
member.summary: TODO NOVA-5424: Move property to DonorUpdate parent model.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.Adult.Adult.DonorStatus
member.summary: This hides the enum value `DonorStatus` on the base model - it is a string representation of the same data from Solar

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.Donor.IsQualityControl
member.summary: Driven by the DONOR_TYPE in the Solar Oracle database - a value of `QualityControl` will map to true. Cord donors are not ever expected to be quality control - only adults.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.Donor.TestNotes
member.summary: The notes are referred to as HLA_NOTES in Solar Oracle DB However they can also contain CMV testing notes

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.DonorImportType
member.summary: This enum is used in the donor database, so you should not remove or renumber any of the values without running migrations on the donor database.

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.DonorType
member.summary: A very broad categorisation of donors into adults or cords. The "donor type" as stored in Solar has many more options for each of these types. For many features the distinction between adult and cord is more useful, and is not trivially calculated from the Solar Donor Type

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.RegistrationMethod
member.summary:
Driven by the DONOR_STATUS_TYPE column in Oracle.
Indicates the method used to sign up a donor. Due to the way this is stored in Oracle, this information will only be available for donors currently in the process of registration - for registered donors the state will instead be Active or Closed.

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.RegistrationStatus
member.summary:
Driven by the DONOR_STATUS_TYPE column in Oracle.
Indicates whether a donor is currently undergoing registration. A donor will be considered to be undergoing registration if the status is one of those assigned to new donors: Enquiry, First Time Donor, or Clinical

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.Donor.RegistryCode
member.summary: This enum is used specifically for the donor export and import workflow. It is also used in the donor database, so you should not remove or renumber any of the values without running migrations on the donor database.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.International.Creation.InternationalDonorCreationModel`1.ExternalRegistryId
member.summary: The external registry's id, as provided by Oracle.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.International.InternationalDonor.ExternalRegistryId
member.summary: The external registry's id, as provided by Oracle.

member.name: P:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.FunctionParameters.PublishUpdatedDonors.IPublishUpdatedDonorsModel.BatchSize
member.summary: If batch size is null, then all eligible donors will be published.

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.SearchableDonors.SearchableDonorInformation
member.summary: Donor info containing only the information required to search for donors - e.g. by the search algorithm service This only includes the bare minimum for a search for performance reasons.

member.name: T:Nova.DonorService.Client.Models.SearchableDonors.SearchableDonorInformationPage
member.summary: A page of donor info containing only the information required by the search-algorithm.
